statements: SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE description LIKE '%furniture%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, description, price, stock_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC, stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%' AND stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 10 OR product_name LIKE '%chair%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 AND stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_information
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM product_information WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_information ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_information
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, description FROM product_information WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_information JOIN inventory_levels ON product_information.product_id = inventory_levels.product_id
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, description FROM product_descriptions;
SELECT price, product_id FROM pricing_data;
SELECT description, price FROM product_descriptions JOIN pricing_data USING (product_id);
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, description FROM product_descriptions ORDER BY product_id DESC;

SELECT inventory_levels.product_id, product_descriptions.description, pricing_data.price FROM inventory_levels JOIN product_descriptions ON inventory_levels.product_id = product_descriptions.product_id JOIN pricing_data ON inventory_levels.product_id = pricing_data.product_id WHERE pricing_data.price < 50;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT product_id, description, price FROM product_descriptions JOIN pricing_data ON product_descriptions.product_id = pricing_data.product_id WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels
SELECT description FROM product_descriptions
SELECT product_id, price FROM pricing_data ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT product_id, description FROM product_descriptions WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM pricing_data WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT transaction_id, quantity, total_price FROM online_transactions WHERE quantity >= 5 AND total_price > 100 ORDER BY total_price ASC
SELECT product_id, description, price FROM product_descriptions JOIN pricing_data USING(product_id) WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY product_id

SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
